00008 void GuiManagment::CustomerTableView(QTableWidget *customerTable ,  QLineEdit *edt )
00009 {
00010     int i;
00011 
00012     if( edt->text()!="")
00013     {
00014         vector<Customer> searchCustomers;
00015 
00016         searchCustomers = CM.searchCustomerByValue( edt->text());
00017 
00018         customerTable->setRowCount(searchCustomers.size());
00019         customerTable->setColumnCount(4);
00020         customerTable->setHorizontalHeaderLabels(QStringList() << QObject::tr("ID")
00021                                                                       << QObject::tr("Name")
00022                                                                       << QObject::tr("SurName")
00023                                                                       << QObject::tr("Group ID"));
00024 
00025         for (i=0;i<(int)searchCustomers.size();i++)
00026         {
00027             customerTable->setItem(i,0,new QTableWidgetItem(searchCustomers[i].getId()));
00028             customerTable->setItem(i,1,new QTableWidgetItem(searchCustomers[i].getName()));
00029             customerTable->setItem(i,2,new QTableWidgetItem(searchCustomers[i].getSurname()));
00030             customerTable->setItem(i,3,new QTableWidgetItem(QString("%1").arg(searchCustomers[i].getGroupId())));
00031         }
00032     }
00033     else
00034     {
00035         customerTable->setRowCount(0);
00036         customerTable->setColumnCount(4);
00037         customerTable->setHorizontalHeaderLabels(QStringList() << QObject::tr("ID")
00038                                                                       << QObject::tr("Name")
00039                                                                       << QObject::tr("SurName")
00040                                                                       << QObject::tr("Group ID"));
00041     }
00042 }

00044 void GuiManagment::RoomtableView( QTableWidget *RoomTable )
00045 {
00046     int i;
00047     vector<Room> Room;
00048     Room = RM.fetchAllRooms();
00049     RoomTable->setRowCount(Room.size());
00050 
00051     for (i=0;i<(int)Room.size();i++)
00052     {
00053         RoomTable->setItem(i,0,new QTableWidgetItem( QString("%1").arg(Room[i].getRoomNumber()) ));
00054         RoomTable->setItem(i,1,new QTableWidgetItem( QString("%1").arg(Room[i].getRoomFloor()) ));
00055         RoomTable->setItem(i,2,new QTableWidgetItem( QString("%1").arg(Room[i].getCapacity()) ));
00056         //RoomTable->setItem(i,3,new QTableWidgetItem( QString("%1").arg((Room[i].getExtras() ) )));
00057     }
00058 
00059 }

00061 void GuiManagment::ShowRoomGrid( QGridLayout *Grid , QMainWindow *wnd  )
00062 {
00063     vector<Room> Room;
00064     QString RoomNumTitle,RoomFloor;
00065 
00066     Room = RM.fetchAllRooms();
00067 
00068     int RoomSize=Room.size();
00069     int i=0,j=0;
00070     int num=0,RoomNum=0;
00071 
00072     while(num!=RoomSize)
00073     {
00074         QLabel * RoomLabel = new QLabel(wnd);
00075         RoomLabel->setGeometry(0,0,310,180);
00076         RoomLabel->setFrameShape(QFrame::Box);
00077         RoomLabel->setFrameShadow(QFrame::Sunken);
00078         RoomLabel->setAlignment(Qt::AlignHCenter|Qt::AlignVCenter);
00079         RoomLabel->setFont(QFont( "Comic Sans MS", 8, QFont::Bold ));
00080         //-----------------------------------------------------------
00081         RoomNumTitle.setNum(Room[RoomNum].getRoomNumber());
00082         RoomFloor.setNum(Room[RoomNum].getRoomFloor());
00083         RoomLabel->setObjectName(RoomNumTitle);
00084         RoomLabel->setText("Number: "+RoomNumTitle+"\n Floor: "+RoomFloor);
00085         //-----------------------------------------------------------
00086         if(RM.getStatus(Room[RoomNum].getRoomNumber())==true)
00087             RoomLabel->setStyleSheet("color: white; background-color:green;");
00088         else
00089             RoomLabel->setStyleSheet("color: white; background-color:red;");
00090         //-----------------------------------------------------------
00091         RoomLabel->installEventFilter(wnd);
00092         Grid->addWidget(RoomLabel,i,j);
00093         num++;
00094         if(j<7)
00095         {
00096             j++;
00097         }
00098         else
00099         {
00100             j=0;
00101             i++;
00102         }
00103         RoomNum++;
00104     }
00105 }

00107 void GuiManagment::CreateNewReservation( QLineEdit *CustomerIdReservation , QLineEdit *RoomNumberReservation , QDateEdit *CheckInDate , QDateEdit *CheckOutDate )
00108 {
00109     if("" == CustomerIdReservation->text() || "" == RoomNumberReservation->text())
00110     {
00111         QMessageBox::about(0,Title,EmptyRes);
00112         CustomerIdReservation->setFocus();
00113     }
00114     else
00115     {
00116         if(CheckInDate->date() < QDate::currentDate())
00117         {
00118             QMessageBox::about(0,Title,DateBeforeCurrentDate);
00119             CheckInDate->setDate(QDate(QDate::currentDate()));
00120         }
00121         else if(CheckOutDate->date() < CheckInDate->date())
00122         {
00123             QMessageBox::about(0,Title,CheckOutBeforeCheckIn);
00124             CheckOutDate->setDate(CheckInDate->date());
00125         }
00126         else
00127         {
00128             Room room;
00129             Customer customer;
00130 
00131             customer.setId(CustomerIdReservation->text());
00132             room.setRoomNumber(RoomNumberReservation->text().toInt());
00133 
00134             ResM.roomReservation(CheckInDate->text(),CheckOutDate->text(),room,customer);
00135 
00136             CheckInDate->setDate(QDate(QDate::currentDate()));
00137             CheckOutDate->setDate(QDate(QDate::currentDate()));
00138             CustomerIdReservation->setText("");
00139             RoomNumberReservation->setText("");
00140             CustomerIdReservation->setFocus();
00141         }
00142     }
00143 }
